title: How to Get the Spectre Boots in Terraria

steps.headline: Get a Tinkerer's Workshop.
steps.description: You can get one by defeating a Goblin Invasion and buying it from the Goblin Tinkerer.

steps.headline: Find the Flurry Boots or the Hermes Boots.
steps.description: They will be in chests scattered around the world. You can find chests like this in small overhangs or caves below the surface.

steps.headline: Combine the the Hermes/Flurry Boots at the Tinkerer's Workshop.
steps.description: Tada, you have the Spectre Boots!

text: Get a Tinkerer's Workshop. You can get one by defeating a Goblin Invasion and buying it from the Goblin Tinkerer. Find the Flurry Boots or the Hermes Boots. They will be in chests scattered around the world. You can find chests like this in small overhangs or caves below the surface. Find the Goblin Tinkerer again. Purchase the Rocket Boots. Combine the the Hermes/Flurry Boots at the Tinkerer's Workshop. Tada, you have the Spectre Boots!
